author: martinc
msg: Added 'name', 'property' and 'scope' attributes to <bean:message> so that
the message resource key can be obtained dynamically from a bean.

author: craigmcc
msg: Create a struts-config_1_1.dtd (currently identical in content to 1.0) so
that we can do DTD changes without affecting 1.0 users.
Modify all existing Struts webapps to use the new 1.1 DTD declaration, and
remove any reference to the "validate" servlet initialization parameter

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove deprecated support for the old (Struts 0.5) configuration file

author: rleland
msg: Add Version 1.1 Milestone one docs to capture changes since
